text: LBV 1806-20 is a blue supergiant star. It is 2,000,000 times brighter than the Sun. It is located in the Sagittarius constellation but due to dust is not visible to the naked eye. The star is 1,135 times larger than the Sun. ==Related pages== * WR 102ka * Pistol Star ==References== Category:Supergiants Category:Variable stars Category:Stars
title: LBV 1806-20
